title: Pain
prompts: Interests: What kinds of pain interest you? Thuddy, stingy, slappy, sharp, dull, etc.
Role: Do you like to give pain, receive pain, or both?
Goal: What kind of experience are you looking to create? Sensory, erotic, cathartic, etc.
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Restraint
prompts: Interests: What forms of restraint interest you?
Role: Do you like to be restrained, restrain others, or both?
Goal: Is your goal restriction of movement, vulnerability, helplessness, enforcing obedience, or something else?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Rough body play
prompts: Interests: What forms of rough body play interest you?
Role: Do you want to submit, dominate, or fight for dominance?
Goal: What kind of experience are you looking to create? Playful, competitive, erotic, stimmy, etc.
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Caregiving
description: Praise, goals, rewards, age regression, etc.
prompts: Interests: What forms of caregiving interest you?
Role: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Caregiver, little, owner, pet, daddy, or something else?
Goal: What is your goal? Encouraging self-care, healing trauma, feeling emotional security, or something else?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Ownership
prompts: Interests: What forms of ownership interest you?
Role: Do you want to have ownership over someone, or be owned yourself?
Goal: What feelings do you want to evoke? Vulnerability, powerlessness, safety, possession, desire, etc.
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Degradation or humiliation
prompts: Interests: What forms of degradation or humiliation interest you?
Role: Do you want to be degraded or humiliated, or degrade/humiliate someone else?
Goal: Do you want the degradation/humiliation to target appearance, worth, ability, vulnerability, exposure, or something else? Do you want it to be more serious, or more playful?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Rules or protocol
description: Titles, orders, petplay, obedience training, etiquette, etc.
prompts: Interests: What forms of protocol interest you?
Role: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Dominant, submissive, pet, handler, authority figure, etc.
Goal: What is your goal? Clarity of expectations, a sense of mastery or success, a failure/punishment dynamic, or something else?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Vulnerability
description: Helplessness, psychological control, loss of agency, etc.
prompts: Interests: What forms of vulnerability interest you?
Role: Do you want to feel vulnerable, or make someone else feel vulnerable?
Goal: What feelings do you want to evoke? Desire, objectification, embarrassment, shame, discomfort, or something else?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Fear
prompts: Interests: What forms of fear interest you?
Role: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Dominant, submissive, interrogator, victim, hunter, prey, etc.
Goal: Do you want the fear to be psychological, existential, intimidating, imminently threatening, or something else?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Novel sensations
description: Temperature, electricity, specific textures, messy play, smells, tastes, substances, sensory deprivation, etc.
prompts: Interests: What kinds of sensations interest you?
Role: Do you want to experience novel sensations, or create them for someone else?
Goal: Are you looking primarily to experience a specific sensation? For novelty? For surprise?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.

title: Aesthetics
prompts: Interests: What kinds of aesthetics interest you?
Role: Do you want to be the object or the observer of the aesthetic experience?

Goal: Is your goal primarily artistic fulfillment, exhibitionism, humiliation, connection with a specific headspace, or something else? Do you want the decision-making to be collaborative or one-sided?
Safety: Do you have any safety considerations? Physical differences, injuries, trauma, triggers, phobias, etc.
